actions.title: Issue
actions.descriptionFirstParagraph: Issue pre-verified, tamper-proof digital versions of identity documents.

actions.title: Store
actions.descriptionFirstParagraph: Let users store & control their data in a easy-to-use, secure mobile ID Wallet.

actions.title: Verify
actions.descriptionFirstParagraph: Offer 1-click, hyper-secure and compliant access to your services via our SSO tool.

thirdSection.title: Break the ice, meet GATACA

sectors.title: Banking
sectors.description: Lead the innovation race with 1-click, compliant KYC  that reduces identity fraud and cuts KYC/GDPR costs while boosting user experience, security, and privacy.

sectors.title: Crypto
sectors.shortDescription: Easy entry & navigation into the crypto space
sectors.description: Enable the easy entry & navigation into the crypto space by enabling instant eKYC while preserving the decentralization and privacy spirit.

sectors.title: Government
sectors.shortDescription: The future of e-governance lies in digital identities
sectors.description: Save resources and prompt eID adoption in the issuance and validation of digital documents such as national IDs, birth certificates or business licenses.

sectors.title: Higher Education
sectors.shortDescription: Grow your student base, lead with innovation
sectors.description: Streamline academic processes by issuing, updating, and verifying digital academic credentials such as diplomas, transcripts, and student IDs.

sectors.title: Travel
sectors.description: Transform traveler experience in all stages: from airline to hotel check-in, SSI facilitates travel through globally recognized, verified digital documents.

sectors.title: Healthcare
sectors.description: Reimagine patient data interaction by offering an efficient and secure access & management of medical records, insurance documents and more.

sectors.title: Real Estate
sectors.description: Optimize and secure online P2P buy/sell and rental processes and make building access more efficent though instant identity verification.

sectors.title: Corporation
sectors.shortDescription: Better for your clients, partners and employees
sectors.description: Optimize and secure online P2P buy/sell and rental processes and make building access more efficent though instant identity verification.

fifthSection.title: Grow with GATACA

panels.firstDescription: Low-code solution with customizable features for your individual SSI needs.
panels.secondDescription: Designed with user privacy as a core architecture element, naturally complying with GDPR.
panels.thirdDescription: Tested against government-grade security requirements and uses post-quantum cryptography offers maximum protection.

panels.firstDescription: Integrated with EBSI, the European Blockchain Network,  enabling cross-border interoperability.
panels.secondDescription: Strong belief in internet standards and Open APIs to deliver portability & interoperability.
panels.thirdDescription: Blockchain-agnostic platform enabling clients to use and connect with networks of their choice.
